_comment: WiFi Network Monitor Configuration - Copy to monitor_config.json

network._hostname_interface_comment: Interface connected to network for capturing hostnames (eth0, wlan0, etc)

_channels_comment: Set to YOUR router's channels only (e.g., [11, 112] for dual-band)
_known_devices_comment: Add MAC addresses of your known devices to reduce alerts
_nicknames_comment: Add 'nickname' field directly in data/device_database.json to name devices
